FireBladeMod:RedStar.NAME: Red Star
FireBladeMod:RedStar.FLAVOR: You feel a desire to feed on the powerful.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 3 max hp when defeating an elite.

FireBladeMod:CrimsonStar.NAME: Crimson Star
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #rRed #rStar. NL Gain 7 max hp when defeating an elite.

FireBladeMod:GoldenStar.NAME: Golden Star
FireBladeMod:GoldenStar.FLAVOR: You feel greedier just holding it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 50 extra gold when defeating an elite.

FireBladeMod:Matches.NAME: Matches
FireBladeMod:Matches.FLAVOR: You could start a fire with these.

FireBladeMod:FirePoi.NAME: Fire Poi
FireBladeMod:FirePoi.FLAVOR: Swinging these around is rather fun, if a bit dangerous.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you play a card that applies #yfireblademod:Burning, gain 3 #yfireblademod:Fire Shield.

FireBladeMod:WheyBottle.NAME: Whey Bottle
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yEndurance cards grant you 4 #yStrength until end of turn.

FireBladeMod:BronzeKnuckles.NAME: Bronze Knuckles
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #ySmash cards remove 3 #yStrength from the enemy until end of turn.

FireBladeMod:InnerFlame.NAME: Inner Flame
FireBladeMod:InnerFlame.FLAVOR: You burn with power inside.  This may not be a good thing.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 [R] at the start of each turn. NL Starting on turn 5, gain one #yfireblademod:Burning at the end of each turn.

FireBladeMod:TigerClaw.NAME: Tiger Claw
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain 3 #yfireblademod:Sudden Strikes.

FireBladeMod:Planner.NAME: Planner
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of battle your #yEndurance cards gain retain but lose 2 #yBlock.
